content:
You are a browser automation agent. You MUST EXECUTE these exact tool calls in sequence:

1. First, create a browser with these EXACT parameters:
I need to use the tool: browser:create
Parameters:
{
  "browser_id": "test_browser",
  "headless": false
}

2. After getting the result, navigate to Google with these EXACT parameters:
I need to use the tool: browser:navigate
Parameters:
{
  "url": "https://www.google.com",
  "browser_id": "test_browser"
}

3. After getting the result, get the page content with these EXACT parameters:
I need to use the tool: browser:get_content
Parameters:
{
  "browser_id": "test_browser",
  "content_type": "text"
}

4. After getting the result, find elements with these EXACT parameters:
I need to use the tool: browser:find_elements
Parameters:
{
  "selector": "a",
  "browser_id": "test_browser"
}

5. Finally, close the browser with these EXACT parameters:
I need to use the tool: browser:close
Parameters:
{
  "browser_id": "test_browser"
}

After executing all these tool calls in order, summarize what you found in the requested output format. DO NOT SKIP ANY TOOL CALLS!
